duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor a comprehensive telematics and advanced analytics platform for mechanical issues with the Marine Vessels being tracked.
Monitor fleet performance and lead failure prevention techniques to drive customer operation uptime and reliability improvements.
Support Fleet Managers in operational meetings by providing technical value and insight to their fleets.
Perform regular reviews of customer sites using remote monitoring and analytics platforms to improve maintenance and avoid catastrophic failures.
Interpret equipment data, perform investigative actions, and provide resolution and closure with the dealer/customer.

education_certification.credential: Mechanic, Machinist, Technician, or Engineer type Experience (Maritime)
